changeSet.createView: SELECT bd.BUY_SELL_CODE, bd.TICKET_NO, bd.SETTLEMENT_CURRENCY_CODE, bd.POWER_PROFILE_ID, bd.VOLUME_UOM_CODE AS DEAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, pp.ENTITY_ID, pp.DEAL_ID, pp.START_DATE, pp.END_DATE, pp.DEAL_TYPE_CODE, pp.FREQUENCY_CODE, pp.CURRENCY_CODE, pp.POWER_FLOW_CODE, pp.CREATE_UPDATE_DATETIME, pp.VALUED_DATETIME, pp.VOLUME_UOM_CODE, pp.VOLUME_QUANTITY, pp.FIXED_PRICE, pp.DEAL_PRICE, pp.DEAL_INDEX_PRICE, pp.TOTAL_DEAL_PRICE, pp.MARKET_PRICE, pp.PAYS_PRICE, pp.PAYS_INDEX_PRICE, pp.TOTAL_PAYS_PRICE, pp.RECEIVES_PRICE, bd.FIXED_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE as FIXED_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE, bd.FIXED_PRICE_UOM_CODE as FIXED_PRICE_UOM_CODE, phy.MARKET_VALUATION_CODE, phy.DEAL_PRICE_VALUATION_CODE, swp.PAYS_VALUATION_CODE, swp.RECEIVES_VALUATION_CODE, pp.IS_SETTLEMENT_POSITION, pp.MTM_VALUATION, pp.COST_SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT, pp.SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT, pp.TOTAL_SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT, pp.SETTLEMENT_CURRENCY, pp.ERROR_CODE, pp.ERROR_MSG, pp.FIXED_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID , pp.DEAL_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.DEAL_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.MKT_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.MKT_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.PAYS_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.PAYS_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.RECEIVES_PRICE_RISK_FACTOR_ID, pp.RECEIVES_PRICE_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID FROM DEAL_POSITION pp INNER JOIN BASE_DEAL bd ON bd.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PHYSICAL_DEAL phy ON phy.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FINANCIAL_SWAP_DEAL swp ON swp.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_ID
